definition: many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
how much?/how many?/(phone number, student ID etc) what number?
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
(used for abstract things) a good deal, a lot of
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad

sentences.english: As soon as you prove to be good, you will get more followers.
sentences.chinese: 如果事实证明你还不错，必定会有更多追随者。

sentences.english: Still, I'd like to see more innovation in content aggregators on the iPad.
sentences.chinese: 我依旧想在iPad内容聚合器上看到更多的创新。

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反应型页面渲染使用懒人框架结构。

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的人都坚持要我再跟他们多呆几天时间。

sentences.english: She may be not much, just want to let you stay with her.
sentences.chinese: 她也许要的不多，只是想让你陪陪她。

sentences.english: And the big money is with the brand advertisers.
sentences.chinese: 而且大品牌广告商拥有更多的广告费用。

sentences.english: He beat the time of Warcraft are less and less time to Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 他打魔兽的时间都少，没有那么多的时间哈。

sentences.english: Spontanous subarachnoid hemorrhage ( SAH) mostly arises from rupture and bleeding of intracranial aneurysms.
sentences.chinese: 自发性蛛网膜下腔出血多是由于颅内动脉瘤破裂引起。

sentences.english: And today his campaign expects more super delegates will be announcing their support for Obama. Mara Liasson, NPR News, Washington.
sentences.chinese: 今天在竞选中他期待更多超级代表的选票。

sentences.english: We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须首先计算出驱动这艘船需要多大马力。

sentences.english: You want to know more about Ili?
sentences.chinese: 你想更多地了解伊犁啊？

sentences.english: It's much cheaper to anticipate rather than respond.
sentences.chinese: 因为预先做出反应远比事后补救便宜的多。

sentences.english: Dumbledore took Harry in his arms and turned toward the Dursleys' house.
sentences.chinese: 邓布利多把哈利抱在怀里，朝德思礼家走去。

sentences.english: Avoid mini skirts, too much make up, and excessive jewelry.
sentences.chinese: 避免迷你裙，化太浓的妆和过多的首饰。

sentences.english: How big is the significance of Nan Qi's 3-D work?
sentences.chinese: 南溪这样做的意义有多大？

definition: few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
for the most part/many/most/the greater part/mostly
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
